snippet: In a collaborative evening, Raja Feather Kelly and Tzveta Kassabova presented four pieces they created on their own, together and with the choreographer Sara Pearson.
lead_paragraph: In a collaborative evening, Raja Feather Kelly and Tzveta Kassabova presented four pieces they created on their own, together and with the choreographer Sara Pearson.

headline.print_headline: Attuned in Rhythm, Whether Together or Apart
headline.seo: Raja Feather Kelly and Tzveta Kassabova Join Forces
headline.main: Attuned in Rhythm, Whether Together or Apart
